name: unattuned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to understand or recognize something: Unattuned to the subtle methods of marketing, the author of the article seems to be unaware of its subversive effects. Coming from the city, I was so unattuned that I exclaimed, "Oh look! They've put fairy lights in the trees!"
More examplesFewer examplesSome of those old-school teachers were unattuned to adolescents' personal development.Their ears, unattuned to the scale of such noise, seemed to have been shaken loose from their heads.When new parents become unattuned, they may need support to find that balance again.
